question:
From the following tools/techniques of genetic engineering, identify those which are required for cloning a bacterial gene in animal cells and choose the correct option:

I. Endonuclease
II. Ligase
III. A. tumefaciens
IV. Microinjection
V. Gene gun
VI. Lysozyme
VII. Cellulase
VIII. Electrophoresis
choices: II, III, IV, VI, VII, VIII
explanation: To clone a bacterial gene in animal cells: Lysozyme (VI) to break bacterial cell wall, Endonuclease (I) and Ligase (II) to manipulate DNA, Electrophoresis (VIII) to check DNA, and Microinjection (IV) to introduce into animal cell.
